usage: Used for strength training, resistance exercises, and fitness workouts at home, in classes, or in a gym area.
key_features: Dumbbell hand weights for exercise and resistance training
Ideal for fitness classes, home gym, or workout area
Cast iron construction with neoprene coating for durability and safety
Printed weight number on each end cap
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
ai_description: A pair of compact pink hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth neoprene-coated finish and a short, straight handle. Each end cap is clearly printed with the KAKSS logo and weight marking, giving a clean, modern look suited to home workout spaces or fitness studios.
target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, and class participants looking for light fixed-weight dumbbells.
product_name: KAKSS Neoprene Workout Fixed Weight Dumbbell (4-Pound, Set Of 2pc)
